NanoPot Quickstart¶

NanoPot is a simple TCP honeypot written in Python 3.

Installation¶

python -m pip install nanopot

Running¶

python -m nanopot

Installing as Debian package¶

Get the .deb from GitHub releases page, and run:

sudo dpkg -i nanopot-1.0.0.deb

Then enable the service with:

sudo systemctl enable nanopot

Config defaults to /etc/nanopot.ini. Logs will be available in /var/log/nanopot.log.

Source Code¶

https://github.com/DevDungeon/NanoPot

Documentation¶

https://nanopot.rtfd.io
